hh3cDot11WIDS.name: hh3cDot11WIDS

revisions.description: Add new nodes and table to support new featrues of WIDS.
Add new nodes to support new featrues of WIDS.
To fix bugs in the MIB file.
To fix bugs in the MIB file.
The initial revision of this MIB module.

hh3cDot11WIDS.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip: 100085
hh3cDot11WIDS.description: This MIB provides information about WIDS feature. GLOSSARY Wireless Intrusion Detection Sensor (WIDS) WIDS is designed to be employed in an area that is serviced by an existing wireless network. It aids in the early detection of malicious outsider attacks and intrusions via wireless networks. Rogue AP A rogue access point is any Wi-Fi access point connected to the network without authorization. As it is not authorized, if there is any weakness in the AP, the hacker will have chance to compromise the network. Rogue Station It is similiar to Rogue AP, while it is a station. Monitor AP An AP will scan or listen to the air, and try to detect wireless attack in the network. Some AP products will work only in monitor role, while some AP products could switch between normal AP role (only provide wireless access service)and monitor AP role. Ad Hoc Mode Station could work under Ad hoc mode, then they could directly do peer-to-peer communication without other device support.

Hh3cDot11WIDSDevPermitType.name: Hh3cDot11WIDSDevPermitType
Hh3cDot11WIDSDevPermitType.description: Represents whether the detected device is permitted or a rogue.

Hh3cDot11WIDSAtkType.name: Hh3cDot11WIDSAtkType
Hh3cDot11WIDSAtkType.description: The type of attack. This object has following defined values: 'act': Action Frame 'asr': Association Request 'aur': Authentication Request 'daf': Deauthentication Frame 'dar': Disassociation Request 'ndf': Null Data Frame 'pbr': Probe Request 'rar': Reassociation Request 'saf': Spoofed Disassociation Frame 'sdf': Spoofed Deauthentication Frame 'wiv': Weak IV Detected

hh3cDot11WIDSScanMode.name: hh3cDot11WIDSScanMode
hh3cDot11WIDSScanMode.description: Represents the scope of channels to be scanned. The following value are supported all(1) - Do scan on all the channels. auto(2) - Do scan for the channels that automatically selected by WIDS.

hh3cDot11WIDSScanChannelList.name: hh3cDot11WIDSScanChannelList
hh3cDot11WIDSScanChannelList.description: Represents the channel scope to be scanned when hh3cDot11WIDSScanMode is configurated as channelSpec mode. Each channel value will be separated by comma character.

hh3cDot11DevAgingTime.name: hh3cDot11DevAgingTime
hh3cDot11DevAgingTime.description: Represents the age time for entries in the detected device table. If an entry is not detected within the interval, it is deleted from the detected device table. If the deleted entry is that of a rogue, it is added into the rogue history table.

hh3cDot11DynBlkListEnable.name: hh3cDot11DynBlkListEnable
hh3cDot11DynBlkListEnable.description: Represents whether the dynamic blacklist feature is enabled or not. 'true' : Enable the dynamic blacklist feature to filter out unwanted clients, which will not get associated. 'false' : Disable the dynamic blacklist feature.

hh3cDot11DynBlkListLifeTime.name: hh3cDot11DynBlkListLifeTime
hh3cDot11DynBlkListLifeTime.description: Represents the lifetime for dynamic blacklist entries. If a dynamic blacklist entry is not detected within the lifetime, the entry will be removed from the dynamic blacklist. The lifetime becomes active only if dynamic blacklist feature is enabled.

hh3cDot11FloodAtkDctEnable.name: hh3cDot11FloodAtkDctEnable
hh3cDot11FloodAtkDctEnable.description: Represents whether detection of flood attack is enabled or not. 'true' : Enable the detection of flood attack. 'false' : Disable the detection of flood attack.

hh3cDot11SpoofAtkDctEnable.name: hh3cDot11SpoofAtkDctEnable
hh3cDot11SpoofAtkDctEnable.description: Represents whether detection of Spoof attack is enabled or not. 'true' : Enable the detection of Spoof attack. 'false' : Disable the detection of Spoof attack.

hh3cDot11WeakIVAtkDctEnable.name: hh3cDot11WeakIVAtkDctEnable
hh3cDot11WeakIVAtkDctEnable.description: Represents whether detection of weak-iv attack is enabled or not. 'true' : Enable the detection of weak-iv attack. 'false' : Disable the detection of weak-iv attack.

hh3cDot11ResetWIDSRogueHistory.name: hh3cDot11ResetWIDSRogueHistory
hh3cDot11ResetWIDSRogueHistory.description: This object is used to clear all entries from the rogue history table. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11ResetWIDSHistroy.name: hh3cDot11ResetWIDSHistroy
hh3cDot11ResetWIDSHistroy.description: This object is used to clear the history information of attacks detected in the WLAN system. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11ResetWIDSStatistics.name: hh3cDot11ResetWIDSStatistics
hh3cDot11ResetWIDSStatistics.description: This object is used to clear the statistics of attacks detected in the WLAN system. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11ResetAllDynBlkList.name: hh3cDot11ResetAllDynBlkList
hh3cDot11ResetAllDynBlkList.description: This object is used to remove all entries from the dynamic blacklist. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11ResetAllStcBlkList.name: hh3cDot11ResetAllStcBlkList
hh3cDot11ResetAllStcBlkList.description: This object is used to remove all entries from the static blacklist. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11ResetAllWhtBlkList.name: hh3cDot11ResetAllWhtBlkList
hh3cDot11ResetAllWhtBlkList.description: This object is used to remove all entries from the static whitelist. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11ResetAllDctRogueAP.name: hh3cDot11ResetAllDctRogueAP
hh3cDot11ResetAllDctRogueAP.description: This object is used to clear the information of all detected rogue APs. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11ResetAllDctRogueSta.name: hh3cDot11ResetAllDctRogueSta
hh3cDot11ResetAllDctRogueSta.description: This object is used to clear the information of all detected rogue clients. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11ResetAllDctAdhoc.name: hh3cDot11ResetAllDctAdhoc
hh3cDot11ResetAllDctAdhoc.description: This object is used to clear the information of all detected ad hoc devices. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11ResetAllDctDevice.name: hh3cDot11ResetAllDctDevice
hh3cDot11ResetAllDctDevice.description: This object is used to clear the information of all detected devices. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11ResetAllDctSSID.name: hh3cDot11ResetAllDctSSID
hh3cDot11ResetAllDctSSID.description: This object is used to clear the information of all detected SSIDs. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11WidsFloodInterval.name: hh3cDot11WidsFloodInterval
hh3cDot11WidsFloodInterval.description: The interval of WIDS flood detection.

hh3cDot11WidsBlackListThreshold.name: hh3cDot11WidsBlackListThreshold
hh3cDot11WidsBlackListThreshold.description: When flood attack exceeds the value of this node, the MAC address will be added into black list.

hh3cDot11SSIDFilterOnOff.name: hh3cDot11SSIDFilterOnOff
hh3cDot11SSIDFilterOnOff.description: Represents whether the SSID permit feature is enabled or not.

hh3cDot11BSSIDFilterOnOff.name: hh3cDot11BSSIDFilterOnOff
hh3cDot11BSSIDFilterOnOff.description: Represents whether the BSSID permit feature is enabled or not.

hh3cDot11WIDSPermitVendorTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSPermitVendorTable
hh3cDot11WIDSPermitVendorTable.description: The table provides the permitted vendor list, and each vendor will be identified by OUI. The legal device should be made by the permitted vendors.

hh3cDot11WIDSPermitVendorEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSPermitVendorEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSPermitVendorEntry.description: Each entry provides the information of permitted vendor.

hh3cDot11VendorOUI.name: hh3cDot11VendorOUI
hh3cDot11VendorOUI.description: Represents the vendor OUI information of the wireless device.

hh3cDot11PermitVendorRowStatus.name: hh3cDot11PermitVendorRowStatus
hh3cDot11PermitVendorRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry.

hh3cDot11VendorName.name: hh3cDot11VendorName
hh3cDot11VendorName.description: Represents the vendor name of the wireless device.

hh3cDot11WIDSPermitSSIDTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSPermitSSIDTable
hh3cDot11WIDSPermitSSIDTable.description: The table represents the list of SSID could be permitted in the wireless network.

hh3cDot11WIDSPermitSSIDEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSPermitSSIDEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSPermitSSIDEntry.description: Each entry provides the information of permitted SSID.

hh3cDot11PermitSSID.name: hh3cDot11PermitSSID
hh3cDot11PermitSSID.description: Represents the permitted SSID in the wireless network.

hh3cDot11PermitSSIDRowStatus.name: hh3cDot11PermitSSIDRowStatus
hh3cDot11PermitSSIDRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry.

hh3cDot11PermitSSIDDetected.name: hh3cDot11PermitSSIDDetected
hh3cDot11PermitSSIDDetected.description: Represents whether the permitted SSID is detected or not.

hh3cDot11WIDSIgnoreListTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSIgnoreListTable
hh3cDot11WIDSIgnoreListTable.description: The table provides the MAC address list of stations or APs, and WIDS always take them as legal stations or APs.

hh3cDot11WIDSIgnoreListEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSIgnoreListEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSIgnoreListEntry.description: Each entry contains the MAC address of station or AP, and WIDS always take it as legal station or AP.

hh3cDot11IgnoreMAC.name: hh3cDot11IgnoreMAC
hh3cDot11IgnoreMAC.description: Represents the MAC address of station or AP, and WIDS always take it as legal station or AP.

hh3cDot11IgnoreListRowStatus.name: hh3cDot11IgnoreListRowStatus
hh3cDot11IgnoreListRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry.

hh3cDot11IgnoreMACDetected.name: hh3cDot11IgnoreMACDetected
hh3cDot11IgnoreMACDetected.description: Represents whether the MAC address detected or not.

hh3cDot11IgnoreDevType.name: hh3cDot11IgnoreDevType
hh3cDot11IgnoreDevType.description: Represents the type of the MAC address detected. The value of this object always is unknown if the MAC address is not detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSAttackListTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAttackListTable
hh3cDot11WIDSAttackListTable.description: The table provides the MAC address list of rogue APs or rogue stations, the WIDS will take countermeasure as per the MAC address list.

hh3cDot11WIDSAttackListEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAttackListEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSAttackListEntry.description: Each entry contains the MAC address of rogue AP or rogue station, and the countermeasure will be taken for it.

hh3cDot11AttackDeviceMac.name: hh3cDot11AttackDeviceMac
hh3cDot11AttackDeviceMac.description: Represents the MAC address of rogue AP or rogue station, and the countermeasure will be taken for it.

hh3cDot11AttackListRowStatus.name: hh3cDot11AttackListRowStatus
hh3cDot11AttackListRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry.

hh3cDot11AttackDevDetected.name: hh3cDot11AttackDevDetected
hh3cDot11AttackDevDetected.description: Represents whether the assigned MAC address in attack list is detected or not.

hh3cDot11AttackDevType.name: hh3cDot11AttackDevType
hh3cDot11AttackDevType.description: Represents the type of detected MAC address in attack list. If the MAC address is not detected, it will return unknown(5) for get operation.

hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListTable.name: hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListTable
hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListTable.description: The table provides the information of whitelist.

hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListEntry.name: hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListEntry
hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListEntry.description: Each entry contains the information of whitelist.

hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListMAC.name: hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListMAC
hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListMAC.description: Represents the MAC addresses in whitelist.

hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListRowStatus.name: hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListRowStatus
hh3cDot11StaticWhiteListRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry.

hh3cDot11StaticBlackListTable.name: hh3cDot11StaticBlackListTable
hh3cDot11StaticBlackListTable.description: The table provides the information of static blacklist.

hh3cDot11StaticBlackListEntry.name: hh3cDot11StaticBlackListEntry
hh3cDot11StaticBlackListEntry.description: Each entry contains the information of static blacklist.

hh3cDot11StaticBlackListMAC.name: hh3cDot11StaticBlackListMAC
hh3cDot11StaticBlackListMAC.description: Represents the MAC addresses in static blacklist.

hh3cDot11StaticBlackListRowStatus.name: hh3cDot11StaticBlackListRowStatus
hh3cDot11StaticBlackListRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry.

hh3cDot11WIDSPermitBSSIDTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSPermitBSSIDTable
hh3cDot11WIDSPermitBSSIDTable.description: The table represents the list of BSSID could be permitted in the wireless network.

hh3cDot11WIDSPermitBSSIDEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSPermitBSSIDEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSPermitBSSIDEntry.description: Each entry provides the information of permitted BSSID.

hh3cDot11PermitBSSID.name: hh3cDot11PermitBSSID
hh3cDot11PermitBSSID.description: Represents the permitted BSSID in the wireless network.

hh3cDot11PermitBSSIDDetected.name: hh3cDot11PermitBSSIDDetected
hh3cDot11PermitBSSIDDetected.description: Represents whether the permitted BSSID is detected or not.

hh3cDot11PermitBSSIDRowStatus.name: hh3cDot11PermitBSSIDRowStatus
hh3cDot11PermitBSSIDRowStatus.description: Represents the row status of permit BSSID table.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPTable
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPTable.description: The table represents the list of possible BSS information for rogue APs detected by the WIDS.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPEntry.description: Each entry contains possible BSS information of each rogue AP detected by WIDS.

hh3cDot11RogueAPBSSMAC.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPBSSMAC
hh3cDot11RogueAPBSSMAC.description: Represents the BSS MAC address of rogue AP.

hh3cDot11RogueAPVendorName.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPVendorName
hh3cDot11RogueAPVendorName.description: Represents the vendor name of rogue AP.

hh3cDot11RogueAPMonitorNum.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPMonitorNum
hh3cDot11RogueAPMonitorNum.description: Represents the number of monitor APs which detected the rogue AP.

hh3cDot11RogueAPFirstDetectTm.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPFirstDetectTm
hh3cDot11RogueAPFirstDetectTm.description: Represents the time that AP was detected as a rogue AP for the first time.

hh3cDot11RogueAPLastDetectTm.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPLastDetectTm
hh3cDot11RogueAPLastDetectTm.description: Represents the time that AP was detected as a rogue AP for the last time.

hh3cDot11RogueAPSSID.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPSSID
hh3cDot11RogueAPSSID.description: Represents the SSID broadcasted by rogue AP.

hh3cDot11RogueAPMaxSigStrength.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPMaxSigStrength
hh3cDot11RogueAPMaxSigStrength.description: Represents the maximal value of signal strength that WIDS received from the rogue AP.

hh3cDot11RogueAPChannel.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPChannel
hh3cDot11RogueAPChannel.description: Represents on which radio channel of the rogue AP the maximal signal strength was received.

hh3cDot11RogueAPBeaconInterval.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPBeaconInterval
hh3cDot11RogueAPBeaconInterval.description: Represents the interval for Beacon management frame of rogue AP.

hh3cDot11RogueAPAttackedStatus.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPAttackedStatus
hh3cDot11RogueAPAttackedStatus.description: Represents whether the countermeasure have taken for the rogue AP.

hh3cDot11RogueAPToIgnore.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPToIgnore
hh3cDot11RogueAPToIgnore.description: Represents whether the rogue AP will be taken as a rogue AP. If the value is true, NMS should not display the rogue AP as NMS display rogue AP list, and the MAC address will be automatically added into hh3cDot11WIDSIgnoreListTable. If the value is false, NMS will take it as a rogue AP.

hh3cDot11RogueAPEncryptStatus.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPEncryptStatus
hh3cDot11RogueAPEncryptStatus.description: Represents whether the rogue AP encrypt the frame or not.

hh3cDot11RogueAPReset.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPReset
hh3cDot11RogueAPReset.description: This object is used to clear information of assigned AP. The information of AP which detect assigned rogue AP will be cleared together. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11RogueAPFirstDetectTmStr.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPFirstDetectTmStr
hh3cDot11RogueAPFirstDetectTmStr.description: Represents the time that AP was detected as a rogue AP for the first time.

hh3cDot11RogueAPLastDetectTmStr.name: hh3cDot11RogueAPLastDetectTmStr
hh3cDot11RogueAPLastDetectTmStr.description: Represents the time that AP was detected as a rogue AP for the last time.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPExtTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPExtTable
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPExtTable.description: As each rogue AP could be detected by multiple monitor APs, each monitor AP could have some kind of detailed information about a specific rogue AP. In the hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPTable table, the detailed information for a specific rogue AP will be summarized from information in the hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPExtTable table. For example, multiple monitor APs could receive RF signal of one rogue AP, and each monitor AP has its maximum signal strength by itself. The information will be kept as hh3cDot11DetectMaxAPSigStrength in the hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPExtTable table. While only the maximum value among all the hh3cDot11DetectMaxAPSigStrength for each monitor AP will be kept in the hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPTable as hh3cDot11RogueAPMaxSigStrength.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPExtEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPExtEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueAPExtEntry.description: Each entry contains information of the rogue AP detected by each monitor AP.

hh3cDot11WIDSAPID.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAPID
hh3cDot11WIDSAPID.description: To uniquely identify each AP, and relation-ship between hh3cDot11WIDSAPID and AP device will be static.

hh3cDot11DetectCurAPSigStrength.name: hh3cDot11DetectCurAPSigStrength
hh3cDot11DetectCurAPSigStrength.description: Represents the current value of signal strength that WIDS monitor AP received from the rogue AP.

hh3cDot11DetectAPByChannel.name: hh3cDot11DetectAPByChannel
hh3cDot11DetectAPByChannel.description: Represents on which radio channel that WIDS monitor AP detected the rogue AP.

hh3cDot11DetectAPByRadioID.name: hh3cDot11DetectAPByRadioID
hh3cDot11DetectAPByRadioID.description: Represents on which radio the monitor AP has detected the rogue AP.

hh3cDot11AttackAPStatus.name: hh3cDot11AttackAPStatus
hh3cDot11AttackAPStatus.description: Represents whether monitor AP have taken countermeasure on the rogue AP.

hh3cDot11DetectAPFirstTm.name: hh3cDot11DetectAPFirstTm
hh3cDot11DetectAPFirstTm.description: Represents the time that monitor AP detected the rogue AP for the first time.

hh3cDot11DetectAPLastTm.name: hh3cDot11DetectAPLastTm
hh3cDot11DetectAPLastTm.description: Represents the time that monitor AP detected the rogue AP for the last time.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaTable
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaTable.description: The table represents the list of rogue stations detected by the WIDS.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaEntry.description: Each entry contains information of each rogue station.

hh3cDot11RogueStaMAC.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaMAC
hh3cDot11RogueStaMAC.description: Represents the MAC address of rogue station.

hh3cDot11RogueStaVendorName.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaVendorName
hh3cDot11RogueStaVendorName.description: Represents the vendor name of rogue station.

hh3cDot11RogueStaMonitorNum.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaMonitorNum
hh3cDot11RogueStaMonitorNum.description: Represents the number of monitor APs which detected the rogue station.

hh3cDot11RogueStaFirstDetectTm.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaFirstDetectTm
hh3cDot11RogueStaFirstDetectTm.description: Represents the time that station was detected as a rogue station for the first time.

hh3cDot11RogueStaLastDetectTm.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaLastDetectTm
hh3cDot11RogueStaLastDetectTm.description: Represents the time that station was detected as a rogue station for the last time.

hh3cDot11RogueStaAccessBSSID.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaAccessBSSID
hh3cDot11RogueStaAccessBSSID.description: Represents BSS MAC address that rogue station try to access.

hh3cDot11RogueStaMaxSigStrength.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaMaxSigStrength
hh3cDot11RogueStaMaxSigStrength.description: Represents the maximal value of signal strength that WIDS received from the rogue station.

hh3cDot11RogueStaChannel.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaChannel
hh3cDot11RogueStaChannel.description: Represents on which radio channel the maximal signal strength was received.

hh3cDot11RogueStaAttackedStatus.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaAttackedStatus
hh3cDot11RogueStaAttackedStatus.description: Represents whether the countermeasure have taken for the rogue station.

hh3cDot11RogueStaToIgnore.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaToIgnore
hh3cDot11RogueStaToIgnore.description: Represents whether the rogue AP will be taken as a rogue station. If the value is true, NMS should not display the rogue station as NMS display rogue station list, and the MAC address will be automatically added into hh3cDot11WIDSIgnoreListTable. If the value is false, NMS will take it as a rogue station.

hh3cDot11RogueStaAdHocStatus.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaAdHocStatus
hh3cDot11RogueStaAdHocStatus.description: Represents whether the rogue station work on the Ad Hoc mode or not.

hh3cDot11RogueStaReset.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaReset
hh3cDot11RogueStaReset.description: This object is used to clear information of assigned station. The information of AP which detects assigned rogue station will be cleared together. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11RogueStaFirstDetectTmStr.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaFirstDetectTmStr
hh3cDot11RogueStaFirstDetectTmStr.description: Represents the time that station was detected as a rogue station for the first time.

hh3cDot11RogueStaLastDetectTmStr.name: hh3cDot11RogueStaLastDetectTmStr
hh3cDot11RogueStaLastDetectTmStr.description: Represents the time that station was detected as a rogue station for the last time.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaExtTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaExtTable
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaExtTable.description: As each rogue station could be detected by multiple monitor APs, each monitor AP could have some kind of detailed information about a specific rogue station. In the hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaTable table, the detailed information for a specific rogue station will be summarized from information in the hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaExtTable table. For example, multiple monitor APs could receive RF signal of one rogue station, and each monitor AP has its maximum signal strength by itself. The information will be kept as hh3cDot11DetectMaxStaSigStrength in the hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaExtTable table. While only the maximum value among all the hh3cDot11DetectMaxStaSigStrength for each monitor AP will be kept in the hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaTable as hh3cDot11RogueStaMaxSigStrength.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaExtEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaExtEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueStaExtEntry.description: Each entry contains information of rogue station detected by each monitor AP.

hh3cDot11DetectCurStaSigStrength.name: hh3cDot11DetectCurStaSigStrength
hh3cDot11DetectCurStaSigStrength.description: Represents the current value of signal strength that WIDS monitor AP received from the rogue station.

hh3cDot11DetectStaByChannel.name: hh3cDot11DetectStaByChannel
hh3cDot11DetectStaByChannel.description: Represents on which radio channel the maximal signal strength was received.

hh3cDot11DetectStaByRadioID.name: hh3cDot11DetectStaByRadioID
hh3cDot11DetectStaByRadioID.description: Represents which radio on the monitor AP has detected the rogue station.

hh3cDot11AttackStaStatus.name: hh3cDot11AttackStaStatus
hh3cDot11AttackStaStatus.description: Represents whether monitor AP have taken countermeasure for the rogue station.

hh3cDot11DetectStaFirstTm.name: hh3cDot11DetectStaFirstTm
hh3cDot11DetectStaFirstTm.description: Represents the time that monitor AP detected the rogue station for the first time.

hh3cDot11DetectStaLastTm.name: hh3cDot11DetectStaLastTm
hh3cDot11DetectStaLastTm.description: Represents the time that monitor AP detected the rogue station for the last time.

hh3cDot11WIDSDetectedDevTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDetectedDevTable
hh3cDot11WIDSDetectedDevTable.description: This Table contains information of detected devices.

hh3cDot11WIDSDetectedDevEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDetectedDevEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSDetectedDevEntry.description: Each entry contains information of detected devices.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevMAC.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevMAC
hh3cDot11WIDSDevMAC.description: Represents MAC address of the device detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevType.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevType
hh3cDot11WIDSDevType.description: Represents type of the device detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevPermitType.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevPermitType
hh3cDot11WIDSDevPermitType.description: Represents whether the device detected is a rogue device or not.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevVendor.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevVendor
hh3cDot11WIDSDevVendor.description: Represents Vendor of the detected device.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevMonitorNum.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevMonitorNum
hh3cDot11WIDSDevMonitorNum.description: Represents the number of active APs that detect the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevSSID.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevSSID
hh3cDot11WIDSDevSSID.description: Represents the service set identifier for the ESS of the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevBSSID.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevBSSID
hh3cDot11WIDSDevBSSID.description: Represents the basic service set identifier of the detected device.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevChannel.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevChannel
hh3cDot11WIDSDevChannel.description: Represents the channel in which the device was last detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevMaxRSSI.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevMaxRSSI
hh3cDot11WIDSDevMaxRSSI.description: Represents the maximum detected RSSI of the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevBeaconIntvl.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevBeaconIntvl
hh3cDot11WIDSDevBeaconIntvl.description: Represents the beacon interval for the detected AP.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevFstDctTime.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevFstDctTime
hh3cDot11WIDSDevFstDctTime.description: Represents the time at which the device was first detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevLstDctTime.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevLstDctTime
hh3cDot11WIDSDevLstDctTime.description: Represents the time at which the rogue AP was detected last time.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevReset.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevReset
hh3cDot11WIDSDevReset.description: This object is used to clears the information of the device detected in the WLAN. It will return false for get operation.

hh3cDot11WIDSDevSnr.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDevSnr
hh3cDot11WIDSDevSnr.description: Represents SNR of the device detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPTable
hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPTable.description: This Table contains information of the AP which detected device in the WLAN.

hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPEntry.description: Each entry contains information of the AP which detected device in the WLAN.

hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPMAC.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPMAC
hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPMAC.description: Represents the MAC address of the AP that detected the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPName.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPName
hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPName.description: Represents the name of the AP that detected the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPRadioID.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPRadioID
hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPRadioID.description: Represents the radio index of the AP that detected the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPMaxRSSI.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPMaxRSSI
hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPMaxRSSI.description: Represents the maximum detected RSSI of the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPFstDctTime.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPFstDctTime
hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPFstDctTime.description: Represents the time at which the rogue AP was detected first time.

hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPLstDctTime.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPLstDctTime
hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPLstDctTime.description: Represents the time at which the rogue AP was detected last time.

hh3cDot11DynBlackListTable.name: hh3cDot11DynBlackListTable
hh3cDot11DynBlackListTable.description: This table contains information of dynamic blacklist entries.

hh3cDot11DynBlackListEntry.name: hh3cDot11DynBlackListEntry
hh3cDot11DynBlackListEntry.description: Each entry contains information of dynamic blacklist.

hh3cDot11DynBlackListMAC.name: hh3cDot11DynBlackListMAC
hh3cDot11DynBlackListMAC.description: Represents the MAC address of the device inserted into the dynamic blacklist.

hh3cDot11DynBlackListTime.name: hh3cDot11DynBlackListTime
hh3cDot11DynBlackListTime.description: Represents the time elapsed since the entry was last updated.

hh3cDot11DynBlackListReason.name: hh3cDot11DynBlackListReason
hh3cDot11DynBlackListReason.description: Represents the reason why the entry was added into the dynamic blacklist.

hh3cDot11DynBlackListReset.name: hh3cDot11DynBlackListReset
hh3cDot11DynBlackListReset.description: This object is used to remove designated entry from the dynamic blacklist. The value which read from this object always is false.

hh3cDot11DynBlackListTimeTicks.name: hh3cDot11DynBlackListTimeTicks
hh3cDot11DynBlackListTimeTicks.description: Represents the time elapsed since the entry was last updated in units TimeTicks.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHistoryTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHistoryTable
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHistoryTable.description: This table contains information of all expired rogue devices which have been deleted from the list of detected rogue devices because they could not be detected within the device aging duration.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHistoryEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHistoryEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHistoryEntry.description: Each entry contains information of an expired rogue device which has been deleted from the list of detected rogue devices because they could not be detected within the device aging duration.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisMAC.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisMAC
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisMAC.description: Represents the MAC address of the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisVendor.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisVendor
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisVendor.description: Represents the vendor for the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisType.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisType
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisType.description: Represents the type of the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisChl.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisChl
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisChl.description: Represents the channel in which the device was last detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisSSID.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisSSID
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisSSID.description: Represents the service set identifier for the ESS of the device.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisLastDctTime.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisLastDctTime
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueHisLastDctTime.description: Represents the time at which the device was last detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHistroyTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHistroyTable
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHistroyTable.description: This table contains information of the history of attacks detected in the WLAN system.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHistroyEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHistroyEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHistroyEntry.description: Each entry contains information of the history of attacks detected in the WLAN system.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisMAC.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisMAC
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisMAC.description: Represents the Mac address. In case of spoof attacks, this field provides the BSSID which was spoofed. In case of other attacks, this field provides the MAC address of the device which initiated the attack.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisChl.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisChl
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisChl.description: Represents the channel in which the attack was detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisRSSI.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisRSSI
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisRSSI.description: Represents the average RSSI of the designated attack.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisDctTime.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisDctTime
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisDctTime.description: Represents the time at which this attack was detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisAPName.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisAPName
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisAPName.description: Represents the name of the AP which detected this attack.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasStartTime.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasStartTime
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasStartTime.description: Represents current attack tracking time. It is started at the system startup and is refreshed each hour subsequently.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasTable.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasTable
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasTable.description: This table contains information of the counts of attacks detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasEntry.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasEntry
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasEntry.description: Each entry contains information of the counts of attacks detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasCurCnt.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasCurCnt
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasCurCnt.description: Represents the count of attacks detected since the time specified by the current attack tracking time. The current attack tracking time is started at the system startup and is refreshed each hour subsequently.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasTotalCnt.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasTotalCnt
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkStasTotalCnt.description: Represents the total count of the attacks detected since the system startup.

hh3cDot11BlackListTable.name: hh3cDot11BlackListTable
hh3cDot11BlackListTable.description: This table contains information of blacklist entries, including dynamic and static.

hh3cDot11BlackListEntry.name: hh3cDot11BlackListEntry
hh3cDot11BlackListEntry.description: Each entry contains information of blacklist.

hh3cDot11BlackListMAC.name: hh3cDot11BlackListMAC
hh3cDot11BlackListMAC.description: This object represents the MAC address of the device inserted into the table.

hh3cDot11BlackListTime.name: hh3cDot11BlackListTime
hh3cDot11BlackListTime.description: Represents the time elapsed since the entry was last updated. If it is static blacklist, the value is always 0.

hh3cDot11BlackListReason.name: hh3cDot11BlackListReason
hh3cDot11BlackListReason.description: Represents the reason why the entry was added into the blacklist.

hh3cDot11BlackListRowStatus.name: hh3cDot11BlackListRowStatus
hh3cDot11BlackListRowStatus.description: This object represents the status of this table entry.

hh3cDot11BlackListTimeTicks.name: hh3cDot11BlackListTimeTicks
hh3cDot11BlackListTimeTicks.description: Represents the time elapsed since the entry was last updated in timetick. If it is static blacklist, the value is always 0.

hh3cDot11WIDSDetectRogueTrap.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDetectRogueTrap
hh3cDot11WIDSDetectRogueTrap.description: The notification represents that a rogue AP or a station was detected by WIDS. The NMS would refer to MIB table under hh3cDot11WIDSDetectGroup group to get more detailed information.

hh3cDot11WIDSAdHocTrap.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAdHocTrap
hh3cDot11WIDSAdHocTrap.description: The notification represents a rogue Ad hoc station was detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSUnauthorSSIDTrap.name: hh3cDot11WIDSUnauthorSSIDTrap
hh3cDot11WIDSUnauthorSSIDTrap.description: The notification represents which unauthorized SSID are accessed in the network. The notification will be sent to NMS when an unauthorized SSID is detected on the network for the first time.

hh3cDot11WIDSDisappearRogueTrap.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDisappearRogueTrap
hh3cDot11WIDSDisappearRogueTrap.description: The notification represents that a rogue device has aged out and moved to history table or the device type has been changed to friendly. The notification will be sent to NMS whenever a rogue disappears.

hh3cDot11WIDSDetectAttack.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDetectAttack
hh3cDot11WIDSDetectAttack.description: This notification occurs when some type of attack is detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSDetectWBridge.name: hh3cDot11WIDSDetectWBridge
hh3cDot11WIDSDetectWBridge.description: This notification occurs whenever a detected device is classified as rogue wireless-bridge.

hh3cDot11WIDSFloodTrap.name: hh3cDot11WIDSFloodTrap
hh3cDot11WIDSFloodTrap.description: This notification occurs when flood attack is detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSSpoofTrap.name: hh3cDot11WIDSSpoofTrap
hh3cDot11WIDSSpoofTrap.description: This notification occurs when spoof attack is detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSWeakIVTrap.name: hh3cDot11WIDSWeakIVTrap
hh3cDot11WIDSWeakIVTrap.description: This notification occurs when weak IV attack is detected.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueMAC.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueMAC
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueMAC.description: Represents which rogue AP or station.

hh3cDot11WIDSRogueType.name: hh3cDot11WIDSRogueType
hh3cDot11WIDSRogueType.description: Represents the rogue type. The following value are supported rogueAp(1) - A rogue AP rogueStation(2) - A rogue Station

hh3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC.name: hh3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC
hh3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC.description: Represents which monitor detected the rogue AP or station.

hh3cDot11WIDSAdHocMAC.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAdHocMAC
hh3cDot11WIDSAdHocMAC.description: Represents the MAC address of Ad hoc station.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkMac.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkMac
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkMac.description: Represents mac address of attack source.

hh3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac.name: hh3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac
hh3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac.description: Represents mac address of attack destination.

comments: Produced by pysmi-0.3.4 at Fri May 24 19:11:53 2019
